articles.title: Rupee Falls 10 Paise To Close At All-Time Low Of 83.14 Against US Dollar - NDTV Profit
articles.description: The rupee depreciated by 10 paise and settled for the day at an all-time low of 83.14 (provisional) against the US dollar today, weighed down by a surge in crude oil prices and strong American currency.
articles.content:
Rupee settled at 83.14 (provisional) against the US dollar, down 10 paise from its previous close.
